Class EntityReflection

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Abhigya.core.util.reflection.bukkit.EntityReflection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReflectionUtils.Entities

    public class EntityReflection
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for reflecting Bukkit entities

      • getBoundingBox

        public static BoundingBox getBoundingBox(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                                         float height)
        Gets the BoundingBox for the provided Entity.

        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to get its BoundingBox
        height - Entity's height
        Returns:
        BoundingBox for the entity, or null if couldn't get

      • getBoundingBox

        public static BoundingBox getBoundingBox(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Gets the BoundingBox for the provided Entity. The accuracy is not guaranteed when calculating the entity's height.

        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to get its BoundingBox
        Returns:
        BoundingBox for the entity, or null if couldn't get

      • setInvisibleTo

        public static void setInvisibleTo(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                                  org.bukkit.entity.Player... targets)
        This method makes the provided entity invisible to the desired target players.

        Note that after calling this, the entity cannot be made visible. Instead the entity will be invisible if the player left the server and joins it again.

        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to make invisible to the targets players
        targets - Players that will not can see the entity

      • setAI

        public static void setAI(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity entity,
                         boolean ai)
        Sets whether the provided entity will have AI.

        Parameters:
        entity - Target entity
        ai - Whether the entity will have AI or not

      • setCollidable

        public static void setCollidable(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity entity,
                                 boolean collidable)
        Sets whether the provided entity is will have collisions.

        Parameters:
        entity - Target entity
        collidable - Whether to enable collisions for the entity

      • getLocation

        public static org.bukkit.Location getLocation(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Gets the entity's current position.

        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to get
        Returns:
        Copy of Location containing the position of the desired entity, or null if couldn't get

      • setLocation

        public static void setLocation(java.lang.Object entity,
                               double x,
                               double y,
                               double z,
                               float yaw,
                               float pitch)
        Sets the location of the provided nms entity. Note that this method doesn't teleport the entity.

        Parameters:
        entity - Nms entity to set
        x - Location's x
        y - Location's y
        z - Location's z
        yaw - Rotation around axis y
        pitch - Rotation around axis x

      • setLocation

                               double x,
                               double y,
                               double z,
                               float yaw,
                               float pitch)
        Sets the location of the provided entity. Note that this method doesn't teleport the entity.

        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to set
        x - Location's x
        y - Location's y
        z - Location's z
        yaw - Rotation around axis y
        pitch - Rotation around axis x

                               org.bukkit.Location location)
        Sets the location of the provided entity. Note that this method doesn't teleport the entity.

        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to set
        location - Location for the entity

      • setLocation

        public static void setLocation(java.lang.Object entity,
                               org.bukkit.Location location)
        Sets the location of the provided nms entity. Note that this method doesn't teleport the entity.

        Parameters:
        entity - Nms entity to set
        location - Location for the entity

      • setYawPitch

        public static void setYawPitch(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                               float yaw,
                               float pitch)
        Sets the yaw and pitch of the provided entity. Note that this method doesn't teleport the entity.

        Also setLocation(Entity, double, double, double, float, float) is recommended to be used instead.

        Parameters:
        entity - Entity the entity to set
        yaw - New yaw
        pitch - New pitch

      • isVisible

        public static boolean isVisible(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Gets whether the provided entity is visible or not.

        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to check
        Returns:
        true if visible

      • setVisible

        public static void setVisible(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                              boolean visible)
        Sets whether the provided entity is visible or not.

        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to set
        visible - true = visible, false = invisible

        Returns:

      • isInvulnerable

        public static boolean isInvulnerable(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Gets whether or not the provided entity is invulnerable.

        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to check
        Returns:
        true if invulnerable

      • setInvulnerable

        public static void setInvulnerable(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                                   boolean invulnerable)
        Sets whether the provided entity is invulnerable or not.

        When an entity is invulnerable it can only be damaged by players in creative mode.

        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to set
        invulnerable - true = invulnerable, false = vulnerable

      • setInvulnerable

        public static void setInvulnerable(org.bukkit.entity.ArmorStand stand,
                                   boolean invulnerable)
        Sets the provided ArmorStand as invulnerable. This method is to be used instead of setInvulnerable(Entity, boolean).

        Parameters:
        stand - Armor stand to set

      • playNamedSound

        public static void playNamedSound(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                  java.lang.String sound,
                                  float volume,
                                  float pitch)
        Plays a sound for the provided player.

        This method will fail silently if Location or Sound are null. No sound will be heard by the player if their client does not have the respective sound for the value passed.

        Parameters:
        player - Location to play the sound
        sound - Internal sound name to play
        volume - Volume of the sound
        pitch - Pitch of the sound

      • playNameSoundAt

        public static void playNameSoundAt(org.bukkit.Location location,
                                   java.lang.String sound,
                                   float volume,
                                   float pitch)
        Plays a Sound at the provided Location in the World.

        This method will fail silently if Location or Sound are null. No sound will be heard by the players if their clients do not have the respective sound for the value passed.

        Parameters:
        location - Location to play the sound
        sound - Internal sound name to play
        volume - Volume of the sound
        pitch - Pitch of the sound
